metadata.Title: CVE-2023-26930 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** Buffer Overflow vulnerability found in XPDF v.4.04 allows an attacker to cause a Denial of Service via the PDFDoc malloc in the pdftotext.cc function. NOTE: Vendor states “it's an expected abort on out-of-memory error.”

notes.Note: ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: ipe package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
